Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Unpleasant \Un*pleas"ant\, a. Not pleasant; not amiable or agreeable; displeasing; offensive. -- {Un*pleas"ant*ly}, adv. -- {Un*pleas"ant*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]

unpleasant adj 1: not pleasant; "an unpleasant personality"; "unpleasant repercussions"; "unpleasant odors" [ant: {pleasant}] 2: causing disapproval or protest; "a vulgar and objectionable person" [syn: {objectionable}, {obnoxious}] 3: very unpleasant or annoying
